** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|biomes}}: {{json_ref/biome|tag=1}} &mdash; The biome at this location.
** {{nbt|compound|block}}: The block at the location. Test fails if the location is unloaded.
*** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|blocks}}: {{json ref/block|tag=1}}.
*** {{nbt|string|nbt}}: Tests the block NBT.
*** {{nbt|compound|state}}: Tests the [[block state]].
**** {{nbt|string|<key>}}: Block property key and value pair. Test will fail if the block doesn't have this property.
**** {{nbt|compound|<key>}}: Another form.
***** {{nbt|string|max}}: A maximum value.
***** {{nbt|string|min}}: A minimum value.
*** {{nbt|compound|components}}: (Optional) Matches exact item component values. Each key in this object corresponds to a component to test, with its value as the desired data to compare.
**** See [[data component format]].
*** {{nbt|compound|predicates}}: (Optional) Matches [[data component predicate]]s.
**** See [[data component predicate]].
** {{nbt|string|dimension}}: {{json_ref|dimension|dimension_definition}} &mdash; The dimension of the location.
** {{nbt|compound|fluid}}: The fluid at the location. Test fails if the location is unloaded.
*** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|fluids}}: {{json ref/fluid|tag=1}} &mdash; The fluid at this block.
*** {{nbt|compound|state}}: The fluid property.
**** {{nbt|string|<key>}}: Fluid property key and value pair. Test will fail if the fluid doesn't have this property.
**** {{nbt|compound|<key>}}: Another form.
***** {{nbt|string|max}}: A maximum value.
***** {{nbt|string|min}}: A minimum value.
** {{nbt|compound|light}}: The light at the location. Test fails if the location is unloaded.
*** {{nbt|int}}{{nbt|compound|light}}: The [[Light#Internal light level|visible light level]]. Calculated using <code>max(time_adjusted_sky_light, block_light)</code>. Use an object with {{nbt|int|min}} and {{nbt|int|max}} keys to test for a range of values (inclusive).
** {{nbt|compound|position}}: Tests for the absolute position of this location. Use an object with {{nbt|double|min}} and {{nbt|double|max}} to test for a range of values.
*** {{nbt|double}}{{nbt|compound|x}}: The x position.
*** {{nbt|double}}{{nbt|compound|y}}: The y position.
*** {{nbt|double}}{{nbt|compound|z}}: The z position.
** {{nbt|boolean|smokey}}: When true, success if the block is closely above a campfire or soul campfire. When false, success if not.
** {{nbt|boolean|can_see_sky}}: When true, success if the block has maximum sky_light (i.e. is under clear sky). When false, success if not.
** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|structures}}: {{json_ref/structure|tag=1}} &mdash; The structure the location is currently in.
